con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="CreditoGeralService" targetNamespace="http://pucminas.br/SN/CreditoGeralService/Pedro" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://pucminas.br/SN/CreditoGeralService/Pedro" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:cre="http://pucminas.br/SN/Credito" xmlns:cab="http://pucminas.br/MC/SOA/Pedro" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://pucminas.br/SN/CreditoGeralService/Pedro"> <xsd:import namespace="http://pucminas.br/SN/Credito" schemaLocation="../../../../../EBS/Credito/xsd/ParametrosCreditoGeral.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://pucminas.br/MC/SOA/Pedro" schemaLocation="../../../../../ModeloCanonico/MC/PucminasFault.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="pucminasFault"> <wsdl:part element="cab:pucminasFault" name="fault"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="verificaScoreClienteRequest"> <wsdl:part element="cre:parametrosScoreCliente" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="verificaScoreClienteResponse"> <wsdl:part element="cre:resultadoScoreCliente" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="CreditoGeralService"> <wsdl:operation name="verificaScoreCliente"> <wsdl:input message="tns:verificaScoreClienteRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:verificaScoreClienteResponse"/> <wsdl:fault name="pucminasFault" message="tns:pucminasFault"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="CreditoGeralServiceSOAP" type="tns:CreditoGeralService"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="verificaScoreCliente"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://pucminas.br/SN/CreditoGeralService/VerificaScoreCliente"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="pucminasFault"> <soap:fault name="pucminasFault" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="CreditoGeralService"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:CreditoGeralServiceSOAP" name="CreditoGeralServiceSOAP"> <soap:address location="http://pucminas.br/SOA/Credito"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<schema targetNamespace="http://pucminas.br/SN/Credito" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://pucminas.br/SN/Credito" xmlns:cab="http://pucminas.br/MC/SOA/Pedro"> <import namespace="http://pucminas.br/MC/SOA/Pedro" schemaLocation="../../../ModeloCanonico/MC/Pessoa.xsd"/> <import namespace="http://pucminas.br/MC/SOA/Pedro" schemaLocation="../../../ModeloCanonico/MC/Credito.xsd"/> <import namespace="http://pucminas.br/MC/SOA/Pedro" schemaLocation="../../../ModeloCanonico/MC/MensagemRetorno.xsd"/> <element name="parametrosScoreCliente"> <complexType> <sequence> <element name="pessoa" type="cab:Pessoa"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="resultadoScoreCliente"> <complexType> <sequence> <element name="score" type="integer"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> </schema>

<schema targetNamespace="http://pucminas.br/MC/SOA/Pedro" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://pucminas.br/MC/SOA/Pedro"> <complexType name="Pessoa"> <sequence> <element name="id" type="integer"/> <element name="nome" type="string"/> <element name="dataNascimento" type="date"/> <element name="cpf" type="string"/> <element name="telefone" type="integer"/> </sequence> </complexType> </schema>

<schema targetNamespace="http://pucminas.br/MC/SOA/Pedro" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://pucminas.br/MC/SOA/Pedro" xmlns:pes="http://pucminas.br/MC/SOA/Pedro"> <include schemaLocation="Pessoa.xsd"/> <complexType name="Credito"> <sequence> <element name="pessoa" type="pes:Pessoa"/> <element name="indicaCreditoExterno" type="boolean"/> <element name="indicaCreditoInterno" type="boolean"/> <element name="indicaWhiteList" type="boolean"/> <element name="situacao" type="integer"/> </sequence> </complexType> </schema>

<schema targetNamespace="http://pucminas.br/MC/SOA/Pedro" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://pucminas.br/MC/SOA/Pedro"> <complexType name="MensagemRetorno"> <sequence> <element name="codigo" type="integer"/> <element name="descricao" type="string"/> <element name="isAtivo" type="boolean"/> </sequence> </complexType> </schema>

<schema targetNamespace="http://pucminas.br/MC/SOA/Pedro" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://pucminas.br/MC/SOA/Pedro"> <complexType name="PucminasFault"> <sequence> <element name="codigo" type="integer"/> <element name="descricao" type="string"/> <element name="detalhe" type="string"/> </sequence> </complexType> <element name="pucminasFault" type="tns:PucminasFault"/> </schema>
